title: Batman - The Telltale Series (v2.2.0.5) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_batman_a_telltale_game_series_2.2.0.5.exe"
- Play

Changelog for Patch 2 / GOG-5 (added 16 August 2016):
- Video Streaming fixes
- Xbox One controller support
- Xbox 360 controller support
- Facebook sharing fixes 
- Fix for progression blocker after Mercenary Boss fight
- Full screen launch default
- Limited aspect ratios to the 4:3 - 16:9 range
- Fix for cloud save data integrity if game should crash
- Fix for DLC checking
- Fix for link to cross-title promotion of The Wolf Among Us

Changelog for Patch / GOG-4 (added 04 August 2016):
- Automatically defaults the game to run on dedicated graphics card
- Adds graphics settings to enable selection of Higher Performance Textures or Higher Quality Textures (please select Higher Performance if performance is an issue)

Genre: Adventure - Point-and-click - Detective-mystery
Works on: Windows (7, 8, 10)

About:
Includes access to all five episodes (Episode 1 available at launch, 2-5 coming soon) in this all-new series from the award-winning studio, Telltale Games. PC version available August 2nd! Mac support will be available later this week.

Enter the fractured psyche of Bruce Wayne and discover the powerful and far-reaching consequences of your choices as the Dark Knight. In this gritty and violent new story from the award-winning creators of The Walking Dead â€“ A Telltale Games Series, you'll make discoveries that will shatter Bruce Wayne's world, and the already fragile stability of a corrupt Gotham City.

Your actions and your choices will determine the fate of the Batman.


Minimum system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10, 64 bit version of Windows required
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz
Memory: 3 GB RAM
Hard Disk Space: 2 GB Space Free
Video Card: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM (excluding GT)
DirectX: Version 11
Mouse, Keyboard
Additional Notes: Not Recommended for Intel integrated graphics
